reviews.review: The original is good for the nostalgia but just buy the 2nd one it has more content and this game's campaign with most the active player-base.
Bastante entretenido buena jugabilidad, en algunos momentos demasiado frenetico pero buenisimo, aun hay servidores en linea aun asi no son muy concurridos.
Really recommend to the whole world

I have met so many wonderful people playing this game which i started playing many years ago , and to this day they are still my friends and the game is pretty awesome as well if you have 3 mates this game is an absolute hoot  ... if you don't have 3 mates then be prepared to make some :)
very cool, francis is very attractive for me
its a good game so you shoud play it

Very nostalgic and surprisingly fun and popular!

PROS:
Lots of amazing addons
Easy to understand and set up
Wholesome community
Very fun

CONS:
Custom maps can get complicated

I've loved these games since I was a teenager. Getting to play them again now as an adult, they're no less fun. If you like survival games, zombies, and shooting things, this is definitely something you'll enjoy!
